subject: Boxing
lead_paragraph: David Haye of Britain knocked out Jean-Marc Mormeck of France in the seventh round yesterday in Levallois, France, to take Mormeck’s World Boxing Council-World Boxing Association cruiserweight title.
snippet: David Haye of Britain knocked out Jean-Marc Mormeck of France in the seventh round yesterday in Levallois, France, to take Mormeck’s World Boxing Council-World Boxing Association cruiserweight title.
